comments.body: I think there is a 3rd case listed in the OP (of which 2 works fine), can you add that one
add the issue umber as a comment

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +791,795 @@    def test_map_with_invalid_na_action_raises(self):
        # https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/32815
        s = pd.Series([1, 2, 3])
        msg = "na_action must either be 'ignore' or None"
        with pytest.raises(ValueError, match=msg):
